EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to send automated notifications to the patients whenver the visit note becomes available for patient on portal.
EmailTemplate.name: Notification for visit notes
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} has shared the Visit Note for {!Event.Subject} held on {!Event.ActivityDate}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
{!Organization.Name} has shared the visit note related to {!Event.Subject} held on {!Event.ActivityDate} with {Practitioner}.
Please login into your portal {Patientportallink} to review the visit note.
Regards, {!Organization.Name}
